TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division B Regional 5
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

School Name:

Check your team: ◻ Varsity ◻ JV1 JV2 ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.133.cipherString: By nothing do men more show what they are than by their appreciation of what is and what is not ridiculous.
CIPHER.133.question: Decode this quote from Goethe which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.133.author: Goethe.

CIPHER.155.cipherString: Glory is the reward of victory.
CIPHER.155.question: The following well-known motto needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=11.
CIPHER.155.author: Motto

CIPHER.150.cipherString: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
CIPHER.150.question: A quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr. has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has WE BE THE in it corresponding to the encoded text N T V R S K G T V.
CIPHER.150.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

CIPHER.140.cipherString: Within every struggle lies an opportunity for growth and self-discovery.
CIPHER.140.question: The following quote heard on Pep Talk Radio needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LIGHT and polybius key of SPECTROSCOPY.
CIPHER.140.author: Pep Talk Radio

CIPHER.143.cipherString: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought.
CIPHER.143.question: A quote by Albert Szent-Györgyi has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.143.author: Albert Szent-Györgyi

CIPHER.152.cipherString: A ship is always safe at the shore - but that is NOT what it is built for.
CIPHER.152.question: The following quote by Albert Einstein needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of DIRT and polybius key of SEISMOMETER.
CIPHER.152.author: Albert Einstein

CIPHER.154.cipherString: Puedo decirte, amigo honrado, lo que debes creer: creer en la vida; Enseña mejor que el libro y el orador.
CIPHER.154.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Goethe into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  It starts with PUEDO.
CIPHER.154.author: Goethe
CIPHER.154.translation: I can tell you, honest friend, what to believe:  believe life:  it teaches better than book and orator.

CIPHER.153.cipherString: You need to be able to think Independently.
CIPHER.153.question: The following odd symbols were found on a sheet of paper when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as the Baconian alphabet, written by a prankster. It turns out to be a quote by David Sikhosana.  What does it say?
CIPHER.153.author: David Sikhosana

CIPHER.156.cipherString: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.
CIPHER.156.question: A quote by Dale Carnegie has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.156.author: Dale Carnegie

CIPHER.134.cipherString: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
CIPHER.134.question: The following quote by Dean Karnazes needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of BOAT.
CIPHER.134.author: Dean Karnazes

CIPHER.141.cipherString: No hue-man investigation can bee called reel sigh-uns if it cannot bee de-monstraited math-eh-magically.
CIPHER.141.question: Decode the message from Leonardo da Vinci which was encoded with a K1 Aristocrat Cipher (after being run through a ‘sus' dictation system).
CIPHER.141.author: Leonardo da Vinci

CIPHER.136.cipherString: You are what you believe you are. Your thoughts become reality. I can and I will should always be your mentality.
CIPHER.136.question: Decode this quote from Beverly Sade which has been encoded with a Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.136.author: Beverly Sade, Through Her Eyes Behind Her Smile

CIPHER.137.cipherString: If you want to be seen, stand up. If you want to be heard, speak up. If you want to be appreciated, shut up.
CIPHER.137.question: A quote from an unknown source has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it starts with IF YOU.
CIPHER.137.author: Bill Cosby

CIPHER.147.cipherString: Why don't you ever see hippos hiding in trees? Because they are really good at it.
CIPHER.147.question: Decode this quote from an unknown source which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters TREES.
CIPHER.147.author: Unknown

CIPHER.151.cipherString: Most people, when they come to you for advice, come to have their own opinions strengthened, not corrected.
CIPHER.151.question: Decode this quote from Josh Billings which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.151.author: Josh Billings

CIPHER.142.cipherString: When things do go wrong, ask yourself whether you could have prevented it by being unhappy.
CIPHER.142.question: Decode this quote from Loretta Graziano Breuning which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters DOGOWR.
CIPHER.142.author: Loretta Graziano Breuning

CIPHER.139.cipherString: Emotions such as disappointments or regrets after failures may be common, but trying again and again will overcome these feelings.
CIPHER.139.question: Solve this quote by John Taskinsoy that has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 keyword.  You are told that nothing it contains the work COMMON.
CIPHER.139.author: JOHN TASKINSOY

CIPHER.146.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 19358604 64729. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.135.cipherString: It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt
CIPHER.135.question: Decode this quote from Abigail Van Buren which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.135.author: Abigail Van Buren

CIPHER.144.cipherString: We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
CIPHER.144.question: The following letters encode a quote by Oprah Winfrey using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.144.author: Oprah Winfrey

CIPHER.157.cipherString: An act of kindness may take only a moment of our time, but when captured in the heart the memory lives forever.
CIPHER.157.question: Keyword/Key Phrase K1 Aristocrat Quote Author: Molly Friedenfeld A quote by [] has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with EVER.
CIPHER.157.author: Molly Friedenfeld

CIPHER.145.cipherString: All you have to do is put one word after another, and remember how great it feels to be a writer.
CIPHER.145.question: Solve this quote from Stephanie Lennox which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.145.author: Stephanie Lennox

CIPHER.138.question: The following quote by Cicero needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=11 and b=5.
CIPHER.138.author: Cicero

CIPHER.148.cipherString: Self determination is greatest will power.
CIPHER.148.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Lailah Gifty Akita using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with SELF.
CIPHER.148.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

CIPHER.149.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 170549 1732 086519. What do they decode to?
